snippet.title: Thermonuclear | Sci-Fi Turned-Based Strategy Indie Game
snippet.description:
Gain control of the ultra-advanced cyborg machine 'Thermonuclear,' and use its abilities to defeat enemy AI and end the disastrous war. You can complete unique procedurally generated levels in this sci-fi, turn-based strategy game. Upgrade and improve Thermonuclear.

🎁Wishlist today so you don't miss the next sale.
Steam➡️https://bit.ly/Thermonuclear-Steam
Epic Games➡️https://bit.ly/Thermonuclear-Epic

About Thermonuclear
A mega-corporation has resurrected the development of its long-banned 'Allfather' AI technology, thus indirectly provoking the start of the Third World War. 'Thermonuclear' is the name of the most enhanced cyborg ever created, the ultimate weapon your side will use to crush its opponents. Complete strategically significant tasks, upgrade your cyborg, and unlock new skills and artifacts; only this way can you defeat the Allfather and end the war.

Key Features
✅Be aware of your surroundings: Base your attack plans on the peculiarities of the terrain or the environment. Push your enemy off a ledge, ignite the grass or put out your character by diving into a puddle. Blow up explosive barrels or slide on ice to save the Action Points.

✅Various builds: Combine different types of skills, artifacts, consumables, and scars to complete multiple missions and tasks. Find the middle ground between your versatile abilities for dealing with every enemy and special tools against specific foes.

✅Procedurally generated levels: Complete missions worldwide with all kinds of enemies. From ruins of what used to be a city filled to the brim with heinous mutants to a military factory guarded by soldiers and robots. Different skills and abilities are needed at each location.
